## ChatPanel() function

A component that renders a full panel for chat bot interactions. This includes the message bubbles for the conversation, input box with send button, and header (if provided).

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function ChatPanel(props: ChatPanelProps): import("react/jsx-runtime").JSX.Element;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  props | [ChatPanelProps](./chat-ui-react.chatpanelprops.md) | [ChatPanelProps](./chat-ui-react.chatpanelprops.md) |

**Returns:**

import("react/jsx-runtime").JSX.Element
